website_summaries.verdict: Two pans in one allow for omelette-making showmanship.
pros: Easily showcase omelette-making skills with two pans that make it easy to flip and serve up fluffy omelettes
cons: Food has been known to stick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great quality and useful by themselves as well as a set. Cleanup is super-easy requiring only wiping them down with paper towels. I use these to make keto / no carb pancakes with eggs and cream cheese. Normally they can be kind of tough to flip. With these, before I start mixing I place each pan on its own burner. When the pans are up to temp I pour the entire mixture into one pan and cook for five minutes. I then insert the other pan (already warmed up) and flip the whole assembly for another three minutes. Works absolutely perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael LeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Didn"t Fit Together
customer_reviews.text: This set of pans appear individually to be well-made but the set I received do not close together. For some reason the handles are not formed correctly and cause a gap between the closed pans. I think it may be just this particular set because in the Cuisinart clip I see the pans fit together well. I am returning this set. Also, I did note that these were made in China and I do try to buy USA items when I can.
customer_reviews.author: The Whole Truth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.  Good quality and performs like intended.  Love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this pair. Lightweight and a very slippery non-stick surface. I made the goat cheese, spinach, onion frittata per the instructions that come with the pans. It turned out perfect. The "flips" were easy with these pans hooked together. I'll do a couple tweaks to the recipe but the frittata cooked perfectly! Today I did omelettes and again, easy and great. We have a bed and breakfast so these pans will be used a lot. I just ordered another set so that I can make more than one item for breakfast at a time. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Bru's Muse

customer_reviews.title: Great pans! I love how nice they are
customer_reviews.text: The pans are so nice and sturdy and they are very easy to clean. We did find that when making a scrambled egg dish (not exactly a frittata, it didn't all stay together when we flipped it to the second pan. It could have been that it hadn't set enough in the first pan, but I couldn't tell. Perhaps too many other things in the mix. I am sure that once we use it more we will learn just what we need to do, though. I do love them. We will be trying them out on pancakes this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: McPenguin5

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Spanish tortilla!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for making Spanish tortilla, and it works really well. I could never make a decent one with just a pan and a plate, but they always turn out right with this pan. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: fluxerella

customer_reviews.title: The interlock works great and it really facilitates to turn sides of the ...
customer_reviews.text: First use and it got a small portion of omelette stuck already. I have to say that I was too confident on it that I didn't put any oil at all and I wasn't paying the same attention as I do when cooking omelette with a regular pan. Next time I added some oil and it didn't get stuck. The interlock works great and it really facilitates to turn sides of the omellette. I'd buy it again but I'd suggest to remove the possibility of cooking without oil from the attached directions as it clearly didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty / good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product , two of us have used them and liked them . They do not have an actual hinge, but one tab goes inside the other to give them a hinge effect . When using them as shown , one pan rim does not fit in the other , they simply just come together and there is a little sideways ' play ' That's ok for me but it was a bit of a surprise to me at first . Once a person know that and holds the handles securely they work fine .
customer_reviews.author: Dan'l      Le Sage

customer_reviews.title: Works great...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. Like any other non-stick pan you have to treat it with care. Do not put you burner on High. You don't need to. It works perfect on medium temperature. The two halves lock in perfectly well. Just do not push the top pan all the way in. They match very well. Also be very careful when cleaning. Let it cool off first. Do not clean when hot. Its on the instructions and also it makes sense. I've made the most delicious Spanish omelets with this pan. Enjoy it and Bon Appetit !!!
customer_reviews.author: Almendruko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pan(s)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pans to replace a cheaper (flip) pan where the teflon wore off after a short period of time. These are high quality pans that can be used individually or combined to make a variety of omelettes, grilled cheese, melts, etc. Very handy, even if you just use the top pan to keep the heat in versus flipping. Save yourself the agony of buying the cheaper pans and get a better quality product. The price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Frittata Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pan for several weeks now and am quite happy with its performance--at least so far. I have always liked "frittatas" but disliked having to use the broiler in the oven to finish the cooking. This has made the the whole process a whole lot easier. I have had no problem with "leaks" when flipping the pan and it is very easy to clean. It is a great buy and works quite well for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gaston "watch guy"

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the two pans I received today has some small pitting or nubs. Some are raised, some indented. Hard to tell if the defects are just from the coating or in the aluminum. The finish/coating in the middle on both pans seem thinner than the rest of the pan. I thought Cuisinart had higher quality products.
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: cook x 2
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw these skillets at a friend and had to have it! She uses it often and loves it when making Spanish (thick) omelet (a dish from Spain that needs to cook both side top and lower) Great item to have for any cook to have around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Splendid and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a lady-friend. She liked it immediately ( = my good fortune for making a clever choice). She is now using it for lots more than frittatas. Also browning stir-fry vegetables and shoe-string potatoes. So it is quite versatile and can be widely used in the kitchen. This has my full recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Sydnor

customer_reviews.title: best money i spent.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, I make a lot of tortilla Spanish style and it was hard for me (77) to turn the omellete, this couple of pan facilitate the process very easy, recommend to my friends and they already put their order in. thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: MajikDoggie

customer_reviews.title: Was prone to spill. Separated the halves and npw ...
customer_reviews.text: Was prone to spill. Separated the halves and npw have 2 fair small frying pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Belcher

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: At first I was frustrated with the pan. Once I figured out how to flip the omelet I was able to make perfect omlets. Key is to cook it long enough in the first pan. You'll have to figure that out. Not releasing it from the pan before you flip it helps hold the omlet until the pan is flipped all the way over.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this sooner for sticky foods like pancakes and omelets? Easy-peasy to clean. Easy on the wrist when moving it about on the stovetop. Handy second pan to use as such, or to help with flipped foods, or to use as a splatter-stopper or pan-topper. RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. MCCALL

customer_reviews.title: great omelettes
customer_reviews.text: love these pans they make great omelettes. I highly recommend these pans - however the resident he gave it to was not me! i have had way too many packages stolen in the past so i can no longer risk getting more stolen
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: This pan requires the use of two burners at once ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan requires the use of two burners at once as both need to be heated simultaneously. Pans link well but flipping them over (to cook the other side) takes some practice. Had omelet stick once to the top after being flipped. It was hard to tell the omelet did not fall and I was splattered by hot egg when I lifted the top pan to check on the omelet's progress. Take CAUTION when checking! Otherwise, this product has performed well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Snogger

customer_reviews.title: Great for making perfect omelets
customer_reviews.text: I am a reasonably good cook but flipping an omelet to get the other side is something I have always struggled with. This pan makes it so easy to make a perfect omelet every time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Manga
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of Frittata's during any given year. I love the combination of fresh vegetables, eggs and whatever else I feel like throwing in. As I have gotten older I no longer can flip a Frittata without sometimes loosing it to the floor. So I decided to purchase Cuisinarts and what a miracle. They work unbelievably well, are lite and what a job. The two pans work as extra frying pans to. It was a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hyba

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelet Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I cannot flip omelets without spewing egg all over the kitchen. This pan is absolutely wonderful, and I have become the Omelet Chef! If you like omelets, but can't flip, buy this pan set.
customer_reviews.author: DSabatucci

customer_reviews.title: it's a silly combination
customer_reviews.text: I usually do a frittata in the oven with a cast iron skillet. I thought this would make it easier but it doesn't Not usable in a very hot oven
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bates

customer_reviews.title: Frittata Galore
customer_reviews.text: A little more egg seems to stick compared to other nonstick pan used in the past. Larger size pans are a plus and easy to handle. Would buy again for the simple fact that it’s like having two separate pans, yet may be used as one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Great pan ! I was a little hesitant as some of the reviews said it took a little time to get it right but the first time I used it I made 2 beautiful veggie omelets and nothing burned or fell apart !!! The eggs were light and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my other skillet. I had the other one for about 6 years so the Teflon started to come off. I usually used it as a grilled cheese sandwich maker, but also cooked eggs in it. This is a great skillet.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer odom

customer_reviews.title: The best tool to make Spanish Tortilla
customer_reviews.text: The best tool to make Spanish Tortilla. And egg omelettes!! I have used these pans for almost a year now and they are still delivering yummy tortilla. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hang T.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Already made my first Spanish omelette and gotta say that I'm extremely happy with the outcome! Easy to flip/turn around and clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had discovered this pan early. We are from Spain and eat LOTS of Spanish omelette. The art of flipping the omelette has been passed down from generation to generation for 200 years in my family until there was me. For the life of me I could never get it right. Always messy, always broken, folded. Thank God I came across this set. It is outstanding, it turn and releases flawlessly, cleaning is easy since nothing sticks. It makes perfect omelettes. Although the art of flipping has died with me, I can do the next best thing and give a set to my daughter so she can keep making Spanish omelettes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I make a perfect omelette with this baby, something I could never do before. However, I seared a steak in this pan and had a hard time cleaning it, used a metal spatula to get under baked on meat and it took coating off pan but for cooking an omelette it’s amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: It really work....
customer_reviews.text: It really work.... I've used it for more than 1 moth and till now my omelet and everything I cook in it Has had a good taste and its do not sticken at pan
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Spanish omelette
customer_reviews.text: You can make a large, thick omelette for many servings. It’s the perfect kitchen tool for that.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Egg"cellent!
customer_reviews.text: Frittata or omelet but even better, scrambled eggs! Fantastic for the latter. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sezwhom

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Ideal Frittata pan. You can trust Cuisinart for quality. Now can make perfect, delicious Spanish Omlets! Muy sabroso!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Best pans
customer_reviews.text: Best frittata and omlettes are made in this pan. Super easy to clean and nothing sticks to them.
customer_reviews.author: Charu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: I received the set a day ago and I have already made 3 Spanish tortillas (Spanish potato omelette). I barely had a serving! They just disappeared! Family members ate them as fast as I could make it. PERFECTION! This pan was perfect! Flipping was a breeze! I highly recommend! and I regret not buying this pan earlier. Buy this set if you like to make a good thick, delicious Spanish tortilla in a flash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omelet Lover's Dream
customer_reviews.text: For an omelet lover, this is a must have! I've never used a pan with such a terrific non-stick surface. It heats up evenly and makes omelets like never before. The first one I received was dented, but Amazon made the return fast and easy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Spanish tortilla cheat pan.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for making Spanish tortillas for those of us who could not master the plate flip. I made a few and my mother was so impressed with it I had to confess that I used this and she just laughed at me and said she wants one too!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Alban

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Big Omelets
customer_reviews.text: This Skillet set I received has a really nice durable handle that is rather easy to grip when both pans are hooked together. Just slide the metal brackets together like the picture shows and you can easily flip the skillets. the Metal brackets may be hot so if you hold them together while flipping, be sure to where an oven mitt. I mostly make omelets when I use the skillet and tend to use about 5 eggs to reach the thickness of what I would use 3 eggs for in an 8 inch skillet. The only way I'd like this more is if they made it in an 8 inch size.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Frittatas Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Two pans in one. We love the simplicity of making a great frittata with this device. Very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: He wants to cook more \o/ . Easy to clean. Easy to use as 1 pan or hooking up as 2.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L Porter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I already used it. Finally my Spanish omelets will not break, and they will look amazing. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale D'Angelone

customer_reviews.title: non-stick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to make omelets for a few weeks now and I have no complaints. I use it separately too to cook just about anything else in it. I like that its non-stick and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double Skillets
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this skillet. I like cooking omelets in them. The non stick surface is good.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: What great pans! I use them to make corned beef hash. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: OnBake Platinum

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this item
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I have two skillets, I also have a lid when cooking in the bottom skillet. Great for other dishes than just fritatta. Stays on my cooktop and I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: LF Houston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Frittata Pan
customer_reviews.text: This Frittata pan is going to make frittatas easy to make. In the past I would have to either cook the frittata in a fry pan on the stove top, slide it onto a large plate then flip it into the fry pan again, usually making a mess or I would start it in a fry pan on the stove top and then put it in the oven to continue cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mierzejewski

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! My frittatas come out gray, I am only handwashing them, no dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: N. BRAVO

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago so I could make Spanish tortillas (the type with egg and potatoes). I am very happy with the pans. They make perfect tortilla, and even after a year later, they are in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jac Ro

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy tu use and an excellent alternative for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for anything fried
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these pans....they cook my omelets to perfection and anything else I choose to fry in these pans. Clean up is super easy also. Finally found a pan where you truly do not need to spray with anything as well to prevent sticking....I would HIGHLY recommend this
customer_reviews.author: dobiqueenx2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. So easy to flip Omelettes now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tuccelli

customer_reviews.title: If you like making tortilla española but have been plagued with not ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like making tortilla española but have been plagued with not flipping the tortilla well, this is the pan for you. My son uses it for everything, but being a Spanish teacher that likes to bring in tortilla to my students, this has helped me save face. They are well made, non-stick and have a hefty enough handle that makes the double pans easy to flip. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrisburgh S.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Follow the care instructions so you won't ruin it. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Cruzado

customer_reviews.title: Great frittata pan!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is absolutely great for making frittatas! Non-stick, sure lock for super easy use and a quality product. Bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise2009

customer_reviews.title: No more scrambled omelettes.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good set, great idea. Nonstick and can be seprated for seprate use. Cons: Really light and thin so I don't expect years of life, maybe 2. If you want lifetime buy silver. omelettes
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Flores

customer_reviews.title: Modern way to make a traditional favorite
customer_reviews.text: Makes cooking a Spanish tortilla de patatas a breeze! This may be a frittata pan, but I love tortilla de patatas and the traditional method of using a plate to flip the tortilla was a cumbersome chore. This takes away the frustration and the chance that you wreck the tortilla. Price is just right! The two pans separate and can be used for other food preparation. Easy to clean, Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pitufo1955

customer_reviews.title: Third set bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Do I need to say more? I purchase three of these, over time, to give as gifts. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The anti-stick coating started peeling on the center of both pans after a few uses. I wondering if this some cheap Chinese knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Daly

customer_reviews.title: Okay pan but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make egg omlets. It is a nice size and when you flip the pan it cooks nicely on the other side with no splatter. The only thing I don't like is the weight. It is heavy with both pans and hard for me to flip. Each pan is a heavy pan. I wouldn't buy it again but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: been using these about a month now, almost every day, holding up well so far, cleanup is quick, no sticking issues.
customer_reviews.author: NoNoBaddog

customer_reviews.title: Great Frittata Pans
customer_reviews.text: Love my new frittata pans. Like getting 2 for the price of one. I can’t see using as one unit, but love the idea that I can if I want.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kicklighter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for making Spanish Tortillas de Papas
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan set exclusively for making Spanish Tortillas de Papas. It can handle as many as 8 diced medium size potatoes and 10 eggs, but that is the max. 6 diced medium sized russets and 8 eggs yields a tortilla just under an inch and a half thick. Excellent results and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine pan
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had a battered aluminium double omelette pan which always burned the eggs. It is now a few decades later...I ordered this, used it, love it. Does not stick and does a bang-up job of cooking the eggs on both sides. Does not leak when it's flipped. Buy it; you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Omelettes are easy to make with this set of Pans
customer_reviews.text: Omelettes are easy to make with this set of Pans, I like the fact that it's detachable from one another. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Selvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it So much easier to make omlettes now .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Stapp

customer_reviews.title: I Finally Made a Great Looking Omelette
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s for a frittata but I used it for omelettes. They were beautiful and tasty. It was also a good buy plus I have 2 extra pans. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good pans
customer_reviews.text: One of them has already scratched, but the other is holding strong. Great design for flipping omelets and pancakes. You just have to be fast when flipping, no hesitation, or it will fold in on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: still love but seems not coated as well on bottom
customer_reviews.text: our second set - love these, easy cleanup. This set seems to be losing the bottom pan coating after just a few weeks of using on the stove already.
customer_reviews.author: Jener

customer_reviews.title: Omelet god
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am totally a dufus in the kitchen. With this quality product my first omelet looked absolutely perfect. I am planning on getting a second one soon for our second home.
customer_reviews.author: Beach boy 33

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooking pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan it makes cooking fun and clean up a breeze . Ive been cooking for years and never had a pan like this
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Feltham

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Spanish tortilla
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about a year and use it about 1-2 times a month when I make Spanish tortilla.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan(s)
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. The pans are nice and deep. Very versatile and can be used for many other things. Totally love it. And the price--- can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Scappaticci

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but works well a must have if you're as bad of an omelet flipper as I am.
customer_reviews.author: James Carleton

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Frittata pan set is Great. I bought it about 6 weeks ago. It (they) are just the right size and easy to use. The non-stick surfaces clean right up. This removable hinged set of pans meet or exceed all my expectations. I recommend this item to anyone who has been disappointed by non-stick pans in the past..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blackader

customer_reviews.title: Great pans, they fit/lock together well and the flip ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pans, they fit/lock together well and the flip works beautifully. Great price as I now have two 10-inch non-stick pans for individual use and have used the flip function of locking them together for a number of things besides frittatas or omelets...get creative!
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: I do not use it as often as I would like to. A little messy but overall a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I do not use it as often as I would like to. A little messy but overall a good tool to have if you want to make tortilla espanola but if you are not an expert egg and potatoes tortilla maker.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D Katzeva

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it on top of stove , on low light , to make pancakes ,cake,corn bread, and grill cheese sandwiches, etc. Cleans up like a charm. Locks very well when flipping.☺
customer_reviews.author: Georgette E Mobley

customer_reviews.title: love them, recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Got them, love them, recommend them. Excellent for cooking eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is SO much better! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make Tortilla Espanola. Works perfectly for flipping without making an eggy mess. I tend to heat the top pan on a separate burner so that when I flip the tortilla, it goes into a hot pan. Prior to this pan, I would have to flip using a large plate, this is SO much better! Love it, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Renee

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to make omelettes / pancakes out there !
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love my frittata pan! We use it for frittatas, omelettes and separately as a fry pan. Very easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: The Pan for Frittata Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pan for making perfect frittatas. Besides being easy to use, it actually seems to make the frittata rise so that it's thick and fluffy. No more trying to flip a frittata and making a mess while doing so. The interlocking pans make it one easy, mess free step. And the pans can be used separately as normal frying pans. They clean up very easily too. I bought three -- one for my mom and sister too!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my pans!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my pans. They make for the best tortilla Española. Great presentation too! I also purchased another set of pans as a birthday gift for my son, who loves to cook for himself & friends. He thanked me for the perfect b'day gift.👍❤❗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frittata/omelet pan
customer_reviews.text: We had our first frittata yesterday and boy was it great. Love this pan set
customer_reviews.author: Dolores D'Herde

customer_reviews.title: These pans are great! I've had them a few weeks now
customer_reviews.text: WOW! These pans are great! I've had them a few weeks now. I made a frittata first, that turned out well. Then I made an omlette. It works amazing for that! I use it almost daily now! These pans are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it when I use it which is not too often
customer_reviews.author: MCG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Perfect for making Spanish tortilla omelets! Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Zonchick

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Frittata Pans
customer_reviews.text: Frittata pans work very well to create delicious omelettes. Clean up is fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: G Nishi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent frittata pan set
customer_reviews.text: Great item; very well constructed; easy to clean. We are still learning how to use it though, especially in how to scale down quantities for relatively few servings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: This frittata or omelet maker is great, bought 4 for Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: This frittata or omelet maker is great , bought 4 for Christmas gifts, and everyone loves them. They make perfect frittatas and excellent omelettes.
customer_reviews.author: francine burtt

customer_reviews.title: Win-Win
customer_reviews.text: This pan works great. It is easy to clean and you get two pans for the price of one! So far it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: She makes the best frittats, but she is elderly and can no ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking. I bought this for my mom. She makes the best frittats, but she is elderly and can no longer flip over a regular pan with the dish underneath. Size is also perfect/.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Love how many different uses we’ve found for these pans!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my husband...we both love using these pans.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cooks 10X faster than a single pan. And can cook both sides evenly (As long as you remember to flip it of course) HIghly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick Frittata
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in the kitchen. Makes omelettes so easy to cook. I no longer have to ask my husband to turn the omelette over for me.

customer_reviews.title: A New Cooking Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Started a Spanish tortilla revolution in my home. The size is perfect for guests.
customer_reviews.author: serious-buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I have made many nice omlettes
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have made many nice omlettes. It is non stick. I use silicone utensils and it is not scratched at all. I heat the top pan a little on another burner, before I flip it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: p  klein

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Seller: 5 Stars Product Quality: 5 Stars Finally being able to make my omelettes without making a mess! great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Spanish Tortilla (Potatos)
customer_reviews.text: I got this item to make Spanish Tortilla, until now I used to flip the tortilla using a rimless 12 inches stainless steel or aluminum lid. Yesterday I use this double skillet for the first time with excellent results. Perfect size, light weight important when you have to flip the tortilla and the non-sticky surface a plus. These 2 skillets and a bowl is all what you need to make a Tortilla. The recipe for Tortilla that comes with the skillets is not my favorite. If you are looking for a good one search for Finecooking Sarah Jay, very similar of what what grew up with.
customer_reviews.author: Teruel deCampo

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Frittata 10-Inch Nonstick Pan Set - Black
product_meta.description: Use the innovatively interlocking skillets to easily cook and flip your favorite frittata, giving both sides the perfectly browned finish without the mess. Use each pan separately to saute or brown everyday meals, from pancakes and crepes to steaks and stir-fry. Features: Use together or apart|Aluminum core construction heats quickly and evenly for perfect results every time. Use on the stovetop or in the oven up to 350 degrees F|Premium non-stick interior|Handles are contoured for a secure grip and riveted for strength and durability. Stick handles stay cool on the stovetop|Dishwasher Safe
feature_bullets: Aluminum core construction heats quickly and evenly, for perfect results every time. use on the stovetop or in the oven up to 350°f
Each 10-inch skillet features a highly durable nonstick cooking surface for healthier cooking and lasting food release.
Ergonomic handles are contoured for a secure grip and riveted for strength and durability. stick handles stay cool on the stovetop.
Dishwasher safe for convenient, easy cleanup
